title: connection issues
body: am i the only one that is getting really bad ping? i am getting over 10,000 ping (cue dbz). it is frustrating that i can not play league. anyone got a solution? i am the only one using the wifi

replies.body:
I haven't been getting it as bad as you, but I've noticed that something is a bit sluggish on Riot's end.

Hopefully will be ironed out soon.
